original_title: Magisterial proceedings against Deshbandu further suspended
original_body_lines: The Court of Appeal today further extended its interim order staying the proceedings against Senior DIG Tennakoon in the Fort Magistrate’s Court, until May 19.

The Court of Appeal two-judge-bench comprising Justice (President) Nissanka Bandula Karunaratne and Justice M.A.R. Marikkar made this order pursuant to a writ petition filed by Senior DIG Tennakoon challenging the magisterial inquiry and issuance of summons against him. (Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
